In Pe'

an open source wearable device that can detect fall
and call for emergency

View on GitHub Download .zip Build your own!

Moments from the co-design session, testing and prototyping of In Pe'

Release 1.0 - 2016/10/14

  • Free fall detection
  • Send SMS to a pre-configured phone number when fall detected
  • Show Date and Time
  • Show battery status
  • Check system health
  • Test mode for user testing

More details »
